channel.title: Mezzyscape 562 loading 663
channel.description:
Well as many of u know i leeched alot TkoScape and most of ppl didnt like :/ so ima start new project :) Now what i will expect for Mezzyscape v3 ISSS
3 Custom weapons (cache editor) Dicing Game No glitches Nex
Got anymore Suggestions ? post them down here and you might get free mod/Donor when im done :D

item.title: Mezzyscape 562 loading 663
item.dc:creator: @DemonWars DemonWars
item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

[quote author=coolguy12123 link=topic=516117.msg3756099#msg3756099 date=1316468983]
Well Demonwars, I am also a fan of your work. I like the idea of your server. Wish you luck on making that awesome server.
[/quote
thank you

Mezzyscape562:

fuck i gotta start all over cuz my girlfriend did sumthing to my comp and had to reinstall

haha had the same prob 2 weeks ago xD

item.title: Mezzyscape 562 loading 663
item.dc:creator: @DemonWars DemonWars
item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

[quote=“coolguy12123, post:32, topic:414156”][quote author=DemonWars link=topic=516117.msg3755672#msg3755672 date=1316422389]

Hey mezzy.

I wanted to give u a few suggestions.
In the new 663 server, can u add a few things below:

Dont put the anti leech thing on
Tons of commands, especially freeze and kill and killall commands.
The NEWEST grand exchange place with a fountain in the middle
Claws 100% working, not overpowered, balanced
A grand exchange system buy and sell 100%
Nex 100 percent working
All godsword fully working
The new hitsplats that rumnescape currently has, plus the new blue defence hitsplat.
Clan wars, soul wars, duel arena and many other minigames working
A balanced combat system, no overpowered items/weapons
100% curses, leeches, saps and wrath working.
Runescapes new graphics HD right now.
New korasi animation, if in multi combat, make it attack multiple targets.

If that isnt too much for u to handle.
Thanks.

most of the stuff can be added easily.
but the grand exchange is a little harder, if you need help while making it, and there are small errors that need correcting.
send my the code and the error it shows when compiling and ill see what i can do about it.
if u need a base for GE use the 508 one from my server.
u can also ask DuhPK the original adder of the GE (the ge base was released on rune-server.org)
[/quote]

Well, I hope that mezzy could tryat least to put all the stuff in the server, because I like servers that are advanced, but I dont leech, I host them so that others can play and have fun, and Ive been trying to find a server will all of those features that I listed, but I couldnt find any. But now I know that mezzy is starting from scratch, and at least I gave him some good suggestions. Im not that good at coding myself, only knowing the basics.

Off topic: I looked at the thread of the development of the server called “Matrix”. I liked it so much, but the problem is that they are not going to release the source and client.

On topic: So I was thinking if mezzy could do all of these things I listed. Not to leech, just to enjoy.Btw mezzy, wish you good luck with making the new release. I hope you make it a super server. I’m counting on you.

Thanks.[/quote]

wow u seem realy like a fan of his work, kinda like deathlover3 xD
anyways mezzy, u do a great job on 562 and u helped me passing from 508 to 562, thanks

Greetz DemonWars

Read full topic

but the grand exchange is a little harder, if you need help while making it, and there are small errors that need correcting.

Well, I hope that mezzy could tryat least to put all the stuff in the server, because I like servers that are advanced, but I dont leech, I host them so that others can play and have fun, and Ive been trying to find a server will all of those features that I listed, but I couldnt find any. But now I know that mezzy is starting from scratch, and at least I gave him some good suggestions. Im not that good at coding myself, only knowing the basics.

Off topic: I looked at the thread of the development of the server called “Matrix”. I liked it so much, but the problem is that they are not going to release the source and client.

On topic: So I was thinking if mezzy could do all of these things I listed. Not to leech, just to enjoy.Btw mezzy, wish you good luck with making the new release. I hope you make it a super server. I’m counting on you.

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Mezzyscape 562 loading 663
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“Mezzyscape562, post:25, topic:414156”][quote author=DemonWars link=topic=516117.msg3749336#msg3749336 date=1315917985]

I have faith in you that you aren’t going to leech this time, good luck.

i wont ECLIPSE ftw
[/quote]Good man!
Support++

Ty

i support this too, i have a suggestion tho: add a NPC vs NPC ability if u can, i could use that, cuz u have givin me permission to use for a base (unless you would rather keep this one for ur self)

and BTW: judostar?
dont you have better things to do then have random discussions with ppl on a site?

Greetz DemonWars

yeah, I’m coding project 05/06 while im posting. I’m also working on homework and shit.

Hmmm NPC vs NPC might be pretty hard but i tries

it’s pretty tough to add it the first time. You probably have to treat it like player vs player, but with npcs instead.

You know thats a great idea actualy,

ye easy to say hard to do[/quote]

exactly. I’d just take an example from a source that has npc vs npc.

Read full topic
